title: You can now SMELL your games with Game Scent! Presented by the United States Air Force
The Legend of Zelda Live-Action Movie Will Take A Surprising Direction - IGN The Fix: Entertainment
description: The Legend of Zelda live-action movie director Wes Ball has big plans for Link's awakening on the big screen. While speaking to Total Film, he spoke about the importance of getting the tone of the Zelda property just right for fans to fully immerse themselves in the world as it unfolds in live-action. The quote reads, "I want to fulfill people's greatest desires. I know it's important, this franchise, to people, and I want it to be a serious movie. A real movie that can give people an escape." He goes on to describe the world he wishes to create as something that’ll feel real to audiences, as well as maintaining that fun and whimsy that’s been established in countless #Zelda games. The Legend of Zelda movie is coming to us from Nintendo, of course, as well as Sony Pictures. Miyamoto-san will be there to produce the film with Jurassic World writer Derek Connolly reportedly handling the script. No word on if the movie will adapt one of Zelda’s numerous storylines or create some

title: Bethesda Teases Elder Scrolls 6 Playable Build - IGN Daily Fix
description:
In today's Daily Fix:
To celebrate The Elder Scrolls' 30th Anniversary, Bethesda has given an update on the sixth main game: they're still working on it. Actually there's a little more to it: namely the game is in early stages of playtesting and the devs are actually having a good time playing it. Don't expect any official gameplay footage any time soon, though, as the game still doesn't have a release date. In other news, Capcom is planning a big future patch for Dragon's Dogma 2, which will including performance fixes, an option to start a new game when save data already exists, and more. And finally, rumors abound of Microsoft looking into some kind of Xbox handheld, possibly due to the success of the Steam Deck and other similar PC gaming handhelds. Xbox's Phil Spencer even talked about the features he'd want in a device in an interview with Polygon.

#IGN #Gaming

title: Valorant - Official Clove Gameplay Reveal Trailer
description: See Clove in action in this latest gameplay reveal trailer for Valorant. Make some mischief from beyond the grave with Scottish troublemaker Clove: the young immortal that keeps foes guessing in both the heat of combat and the cold of death. Valorant's new agent, Clove, will be available on March 26 as part of Valorant Episode 8 Act II.

title: Explore Dragon’s Dogma 2 with IGN Host Max Scoville! Presented by @dragonsdogma
Fractals of Destiny - Official Release Date Trailer
description:
Learn about the story and see combat in this trailer for Fractals of Destiny, an upcoming semi-open-world RPG that blends turn-based combat with real-time sequences, featuring a mix of action and classic RPG elements. Fractals of Destiny leaves Early Access and will be available on Steam on April 6, 2024. 

Become Zerva, a woman born in the midst of a cataclysmic war between the Velixar Azartus of the west, and the light empire of the east. With the universe on the brink of destruction, Zerva will need to call upon her extraordinary abilities to bring an end to the fighting, and restore peace to the universe.

#IGN #Gaming

title: Valorant - Official Clove Agent Trailer (2 Worlds)
description: Meet the new agent, Clove, in this trailer for Valorant ahead of the character's release on March 26, 2024 as part of Valorant Episode 8 Act II. Make some mischief from beyond the grave with Scottish troublemaker Clove: the young immortal that keeps foes guessing in both the heat of combat and the cold of death.

title: Starship Simulator - Official Game Overview
description:
Join developer Dan Govier at Fleetyard Studios for a deep dive into Starship Simulator, an upcoming sci-fi space exploration sandbox game set 200 years from today. The video gives us a tour of the ship, crew roles, tasks, ship customization, exploration, and more. A Kickstarter campaign for Starship Simulator is available now, and a demo is available on Steam.

In Starship Simulator, do your part to keep the ship and its 200+ crew members well-maintained as you travel across a procedurally generated galaxy. Find habitable worlds, uncover compelling mysteries, and make first contact with aliens through careful dialogue choices.

#Gaming #StarshipSimulator #IGN

title: Why Larian won’t make Baldur’s Gate 4
New Atari Retro Console and Game (Lunar Lander Beyond) - PAX East 2024
description:
IGN Access heads to PAX East and checks out Atari's new retro console, the Atari 400 Mini, and their new game, Lunar Lander Beyond, a follow-up to Lunar Lander. Beyond that, we revisit the Atari 50th Anniversary game and Qomp2, the modern answer to Pong. 

The Atari 400 Mini is set to release on March 28, 2024
Lunar Lander Beyond is set to release on April 23, 2024
 
IGN Access is presented by the United States Air Force.

title: The Jedi Kinda Suck... From A Certain Point of View
description:
Ever since the first time that we met Obi-Wan Kenobi in George Lucas' stunning 1977 masterpiece Star Wars, the Jedi have been a vibrant and frequent presence in the realm of pop culture heroes. The cosmic religious order has long been seen as one of cinema's greatest “good guys,” but over the decades that shine has dimmed. That shift isn’t necessarily in their representation on screen, but because of the constant rewatches and ensuing conversations about the people within them.

With our first proper look at Leslye Headland's highly-anticipated Star Wars series The Acolyte it looks like the Galaxy Far, Far Away might finally be about to turn a judgmental eye onto the dangers and impact of the Jedi Order in a way that we haven't seen before.

#StarWars #Jedi #IGN

title: Millennia Review
description:
Millennia reviewed by Leana Hafer on PC.

"I felt the same way finishing up a game of Millennia as I did finishing a game of Humankind: It made me want to play Civilization 5 again. Several have tried to claim the turn-based history crown at this point, but none have done it better than Firaxis. And while things like city needs, National Spirits, and production chains allow Millennia to stand out, they don't really let it stand up under its own weight. I think Percy Shelly said it best: Round the decay of that colossal wreck, limited game set-up options, horrid late-game performance, and a cumbersome tile economy, the lone and level sands stretch far away."

#IGN #Gaming #Review #Millennia

title: Darkness of Man: Exclusive Trailer (2024) Jean Claude Van Damme, Kristanna Loken, Emerson Min
description:
Russell Hatch (Jean Claude Van Damme) is a washed-up, former Interpol operative who vowed to protect the son of an informant killed years earlier in a raid gone wrong.  When merciless street gangs start an all-out turf war and the kid is caught in the middle, Hatch will stop at nothing to keep him safe and fight anyone who gets in his way. The cast includes Kristanna Loken, Emerson Min, Spencer Breslin with Kirk "Sticky Fingaz" Jones and Shannen Doherty. Darkness of Man arrives on Digital on May 21.

#IGN #DarknessOfMan

title: South Park: Snow Day! Review
description:
South Park: Snow Day! reviewed by Travis Northup on PC, also available on Xbox and PlayStation.

We know exactly what a great South Park game can look like, and South Park: Snow Day! couldn’t be farther from it. I’m a huge fan of throwing out the rulebook to try something completely fresh, especially in this age of samey sequels and forever live-service games that increasingly play it safe. But this bold attempt at a new direction misses the mark so drastically I’m aghast at just how sideways things went. Whether it’s due to the thoroughly unenjoyable combat or the uncharacteristically toothless and unfunny story, I can’t recommend anyone waste their time on this cooperative lost cause – even my fellow die-hard South Park fans.

#IGN #Gaming #SouthParkSnowDay #Review

title: BitCraft Preview: A Social, Sandbox MMO With Some Big Ideas
description:
BitCraft has come a long way since that initial announcement. What we played was memorable and – more importantly – fun. But it also has a long way to go. With the amount of ambition the developers are feeding into this game, it still remains to be seen whether BitCraft will fulfil its lofty vision. Previewed by Katie Williams.

#IGN #Preview #BitCraft

title: Stellar Blade - Official Demo Teaser Trailer
description:
Watch the latest Stellar Blade trailer to see vicious foes and more from this upcoming sci-fi action-adventure game. Reclaim Earth for humankind when Stellar Blade launches on PS5 on April 26, 2024. A demo for Stellar Blade will be available on March 29, 2024.

#Gaming #StellarBlade #IGN

title: First Dwarf: The First 15 Minutes of Gameplay
description:
In First Dwarf, you're a dwarf...in a mech! Oh, and you have a pet baby dragon. Gather resources, craft buildings, and battle monsters in a mysterious floating chain of islands above a desolate fantasy world. Check out the first 15 minutes of gameplay in this video.

#IGN #Gaming #FirstDwarf #Gameplay
